caller_intent: The caller received a previous call from Cecilia and wants to speak with her directly.
resolution_steps: Agent apologizes for the inconvenience and asks the caller to wait while connecting them to Cecilia.
Agent plays a hold message requesting the caller to update contact information and mentions the online customer portal.
knowledge_required: Handling requests to speak with specific agents
Hold message protocols and customer portal information
summary: Caller requested to speak with agent Cecilia. The agent apologized and placed the caller on hold, playing a message about updating contact information and promoting the online portal. The call was not resolved in the transcript.
